options.name: Siphon
options.description: When a Creature other than you takes Damage from Bleeding while Adjacent to you, you gain Health equal to the damage they took. If this brings you to full Health or over, gain Temporary Health equal to your Level that lasts until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Lesser Fiend Magic
options.description: Learn 2 Beginner and 2 Novice Fiend Spells

options.name: Action : Bloodlet
options.description: Make an Attack or use the Channel Action to cast a Spell that takes 1 Action. If the Attack deals Physical Damage after Mitigation is calculated, the target gains the Bleeding Condition.

options.name: Improved Essence Burn
options.description: Your Essence Burns are more efficient, lowering the damage die from 1d8 to 1d4 per Power you are attempting to restore. On a failure, the damage dice becomes 1d8 instead of 1d12.

options.name: Free Action : Bloodmagic
options.description: You let your own blood with a Light 1-Handed Weapon, dealing 1d6 True Damage to yourself. The next Spell that you complete on this turn becomes Charged and the Spell Damage Bonus Modifier is doubled.

options.name: Master Bloodmage
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Attack, +1 Spell Damage and +2 Health
